long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# QR Code Generator

## Short Description
Generate QR codes for web pages instantly with one click, making mobile sharing effortless.

## Detailed Description
QR Code Generator is a lightweight, user-friendly Chrome extension that instantly converts your current webpage URL into a QR code. Perfect for quickly sharing web content between desktop and mobile devices.

### Key Features
• Instant QR Code Generation: One click to generate QR code for any webpage
• Clean Interface: Simple, intuitive design with no clutter
• Website Icon Integration: Displays website favicon in QR code center for better recognition
• Multi-Language Support: Available in English, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese
• Zero Configuration: Works right out of the box with no setup required

### Why Install?
• Cross-Device Sharing: Quickly share URLs between desktop and mobile devices
• Time-Saving: No need to type long URLs on mobile devices
• Privacy-Focused: All operations performed locally, no data collection
• Resource-Efficient: Lightweight and minimal system resource usage
• Universal Compatibility: Works with any webpage and any QR code scanner

### How to Use
1. Install the extension
2. Click the extension icon when on any webpage
3. Scan the QR code with your mobile device
4. That's it! No complicated settings or configurations needed

### Privacy & Security
• Minimal Permissions: Only requires access to current tab URL
• No Data Collection: All operations performed locally
• No External Services: No network requests or third-party services
• Open Source: Transparent and secure

### Technical Details
• Version: 1.0.0
• Size: < 100KB
• Permissions: activeTab only
• Platform: Chrome, Edge, and other Chromium-based browsers

### Support
Developer: Ausdata Science
Contact: ausdata.app@gmail.com
